title: @Riot why do you release so many naked male champions?
body:
Where's the justice? How actually dare you release straight-up _nude_ male champions into your game and act like it's OK? You're sorry for Kai'Sa's V-neck? Lmfao. Okay then.

Nude
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/a/a2/Kha%27Zix_OriginalSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170615213359

Nude and _clearly_ a fetish
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/5/5f/Vel%27Koz_OriginalSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170615225859

Not only is he naked but DO YOU SEE THOSE ABS? HYPER-SEXUALIZED MUCH?
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/9/92/Aatrox_OriginalSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170616005218

Of course it gets better. Rock Solid and Woody over here?
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/b/bc/Malphite_OriginalSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170621012910
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/7/77/Ivern_OriginalSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170304034830


Not to mention all the men who straight up don't wear shirts? Not a male power fantasy. Just female eye-candy. 
{{champion:201}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:157}}  {{champion:38}} 

Kassadin shows off _half of his body_ and Kai'Sa, his daughter, shows off a bit of a V-neck. Who is more "hyper-sexualized"?
https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/9/98053/1829256-kassadin_new.jpg

Absolutely disgusting show. Where's your apologies for this?
---
Guys I started by typing a shitpost but then I realized that there were legitimate points to be made and now I don't quite know what this is anymore.
